survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' perceptions of mental health support in the workplace and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall mental health support provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better data granularity. Ensure the options are balanced and cover the full range of possible responses.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall mental health support provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources does your employer currently offer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to accurately capture all available resources.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources does your employer currently offer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health concerns with your manager or HR?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure comfort levels. Consider adding an optional open-ended follow-up for additional context.

script.question_text: How comfortable do you feel discussing mental health concerns with your manager or HR?

questions.question_text: What additional mental health support would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional mental health support would you like to see implemented in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Have you ever utilized any of the mental health resources provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to gauge utilization rates. Consider routing logic for follow-up questions based on response.

script.question_text: Have you ever utilized any of the mental health resources provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: If yes, how satisfied were you with the mental health resources you utilized?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the question only appears for those who have used resources.
